text: No matter the outcome in November, global stability hangs in the balance 🌍💔. The West's influence is waning, and tensions rise from Italy to Spain 🇮🇹🇪🇸. Trump's wavering on NATO & Putin's threats only fan the flames 🔥. Gaza & Ukraine bear the brunt of this dangerous game. We must unite for peace, diplomacy, and stability! ❤️#OneWorld
